listitem.para: value of the message ID used, by this host, to generate the first IKEv2 request message. This value is only used when the initial connection responder sends a request to the initial connection initiator, like in the case of a child SA rekey. The value must be either 0 (the default) or 1. The default value (0) is consistent with the RFCs and compatible with strongSwan, while firstmsgid=1 allows for backwards compatibility with OpenSWAN pre 2.6.52.
